description:
http://anidb.net/ch114346 [Emilyko] ventures deeper into Shadows House. Back in http://anidb.net/ch114347 [Kate]`s room, a clumsy mistake leads to a scolding. The two have an unhappy encounter that raises Emilyko`s anxiety level, but she later vows not to fret so much.
Source: Funimation
